EASTERN IONIAN SEA.
GREECE.
HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS.
DNC 09.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS 0500Z TO 2100Z DAILY
   MONDAY THRU THURSDAY AND 0500Z TO 1300Z
   FRIDAYS UNTIL 31 DEC EXCEPT HOLIDAYS
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   37-48.00N 021-05.00E, 37-31.83N 021-08.00E,
   37-31.00N 021-20.00E, 37-48.00N 021-17.00E.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 JAN 16.
